sn20.11:1.2: “Assuttha no tumhe, bhikkhave, rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ jarasiṅgālassa vassamānassā”ti?
sn20.11:1.4: “Eso kho, bhikkhave, jarasiṅgālo ukkaṇḍakena nāma rogajātena phuṭṭho.
sn20.11:1.5: So yena yena icchati tena tena gacchati;
sn20.11:1.6: yattha yattha icchati tattha tattha tiṭṭhati;
sn20.11:1.7: yattha yattha icchati tattha tattha nisīdati;
sn20.11:1.8: yattha yattha icchati tattha tattha nipajjati;
sn20.11:1.10: Sādhu khvassa, bhikkhave, yaṁ idhekacco sakyaputtiyapaṭiñño evarūpampi attabhāvapaṭilābhaṁ paṭisaṁvediyetha.
